function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Release of virus particles into the air due to inhalation and exhalation","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission in enclosed spaces","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation systems and air filtration, wearing masks, and maintaining physical distance","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HVAC systems with HEPA filters, UV-C light disinfection","People":"Occupants, students, and teachers","Owner":"Building management, school administrators"},{"Description":"Settling rate of virus particles on the ground","Impact":"Accumulation of virus particles in the environment","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of surfaces, minimizing surface contact","Technologies":"Disinfectants, UV disinfection, antimicrobial surfaces","People":"Cleaners, facility management, occupants","Owner":"Cleaning companies, facility management"},{"Description":"Inactivation rate of the virus in the environment","Impact":"Persistence of viable virus particles in the air and on surfaces","Mitigation":"Implementing air and surface disinfection protocols, promoting hand hygiene","Technologies":"UV-C disinfection, air purifiers with HEPA filters, antimicrobial coatings","People":"Occupants, cleaners, facility management","Owner":"Health and safety authorities, facility management"}]}
